original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 8.1. Hetuduka
analyzed: hetu duka

original: Hetu
analyzed: hetu

original: Namo tassa Bhagavato Arahato Sammāsambuddhassa.
analyzed: namaḥ tassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

original: Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nahetuṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ
analyzed: na hetum dhammam paṭicca na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum ekam khandha

original: paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā
analyzed: paṭicca tayaḥ khandhāḥ citta samuṭṭhānañca rūpam pe dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhāḥ

original: cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… (yāva mahābhūtā.) Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: citta samuṭṭhānam ca rūpa paṭisandhi khaṇe pe yāva mahābhūtāḥ na hetum dhamma

original: paṭicca na nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nahetū khandhe paṭicca hetū; paṭisandhikkhaṇe
analyzed: paṭicca na na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetū khandhe paṭicca hetū paṭisandhi kkhaṇe

original: …pe… nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ca na nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: pe na hetum dhammam paṭicca na hetu ca na na hetu ca dhammāḥ uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Na nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca na nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Na nahetuṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na na hetum dhammam paṭicca na na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na na hetum dhamma

original: paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Na nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ca
analyzed: paṭicca na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na na hetum dhammam paṭicca na hetu ca

original: na nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuñca na nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuñca
analyzed: na hetum ca na na hetum ca dhammam paṭicca na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetuñca

original: na nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca na nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuñca na
analyzed: na na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetuñca na

original: nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ca na nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum ca dhammam paṭicca na hetu ca na na hetu ca dhammāḥ uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe nava pe avigate nava

original: (Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ evaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vāram pi pe sampayutta vāram pi paṭicca vāra sadisam evam vitthāretabba

original: Hetu-ārammaṇa
analyzed: hetu ārammaṇa

original: Na nahetu dhammo na nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Na nahetu dhammo nahetussa
analyzed: na na hetu dhammaḥ na na hetussa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ na na hetu dhammaḥ na hetussa

original: dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Na nahetu dhammo nahetussa ca na nahetussa ca dhammassa
analyzed: dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ na na hetu dhammaḥ na hetussa ca na na hetussa ca dhammassa

original: hetupaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nahetu dhammo na nahetussa
analyzed: na hetu dhammaḥ na hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ na na hetussa

original: dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nahetu dhammo nahetussa ca na nahetussa ca dhammassa
analyzed: dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ na hetussa ca na na hetussa ca dhammassa

original: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Na nahetu dhammo na nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Na nahetu dhammo
analyzed: na na hetu dhammo na na hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ na na hetu dhammo

original: nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Na nahetu dhammo nahetussa ca na nahetussa
analyzed: na hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ na na hetu dhammaḥ na hetussa ca na na hetussa

original: ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: ca dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Nahetu ca na nahetu ca dhammā nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nahetu
analyzed: na hetu ca na na hetu ca dhammā na hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ na hetu

original: ca na nahetu ca dhammā na nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nahetu ca
analyzed: ca na na hetu ca dhammā na na hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ na hetu ca

original: na nahetu ca dhammā nahetussa ca na nahetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na na hetu ca dhammā na hetussa ca na na hetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava …pe… purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi …pe… kamme tīṇi …pe… jhāne
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe nava pe purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi pe kamme tīṇi pe jhāne

original: tīṇi …pe… vippayutte pañca …pe… avigate nava. (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṁ, evaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: tīṇi pe vippayutte pañca pe avigate nava yathā kusala ttike pañhāvāra evam vitthāretabba
